title: 2 Bed/2 Bath Suites Close to Campus GREAT LOCATION
posting_body: 2467 Warring St offers large 2 bedroom suites that can comfortably house 3-5 people.

The property lies on the corner of Warring St and Dwight Avenue, across the street from the UC Berkeley Clark Kerr Campus, and just down Dwight Ave from some of the most incredible views in the San Francisco Bay Area.
This neighborhood is just south of the UC Berkeley campus and is central to all aspects of student life and university amenities.
Building includes laundry, private balconies, roof deck, intercom delivery system, fiber-optic internet hookups (service not included), and available garage parking.
Flexible pricing and lease options available.
We also have other units walking distance from campus.
Visit our website for more info on those: <URL>/
For all units: security deposit is 1.5x the monthly rent; utilities not included; units are unfurnished; no smoking and no pets.
Call, text or email if interested!
